articles.description: Afghanistan qualify for the semi-finals of a World Cup for the first time in their history after beating Bangladesh in a low-scoring classic in St Vincent.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: Afghanistan reach semi-final for first time

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Croatia vs Italy in the UEFA Euro 2024

articles.description: Spain get the better of Albania as an early goal from Ferran Torres in Dusseldorf extends their 100% record at Euro 2024.
articles.title: Albania 0-1 Spain: Ferran Torres goal secures Euro 2024 100% group record

articles.description: England qualify for the last 16 of Euro 2024 with a group game to spare after Spain beat Albania on Monday.
articles.title: Euro 2024: England qualify for last 16 after Spain beat Albania

articles.description: Australia’s T20 World Cup hopes are hanging by a thread after Rohit Sharma’s scintillating 92 leads India to a 24-run win and a place in the semi-finals.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: India reach semi-finals and put Australia on brink of exit

articles.description: Slovenia striker Benjamin Sesko has the hopes of nation on his shoulderS as bids to down England at Euro 2024 on Tuesday.
articles.title: Euro 2024: England v Slovenia - Benjamin Sesko will be threat to Three Lions

articles.description: The LA Lakers name television pundit and former player JJ Redick as their new head coach.
articles.title: JJ Redick: LA Lakers name TV pundit as head coach

articles.description: All-rounder Liam Livingstone believes England are peaking at the right time before their T20 World Cup semi-final.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: England peaking at the right time - Liam Livingstone

articles.description: Gary Lineker and Alan Shearer defend their criticism of Harry Kane and England’s performance in their 1-1 Euro 2024 draw with Denmark.
articles.title: Lineker and Shearer defend England criticism after Kane comments

articles.description: Emma Raducanu has "rekindled" her love for tennis in recent weeks as she prepares to take on Sloane Stephens at Eastbourne.
articles.title: Eastbourne 2024: Emma Raducanu finds 'love for tennis' again before Wimbledon
